SELECT tcfmt.free_marker_template_id freeMarkerTemplateId, tcfmt.template_key templateKey, tcfmt.template_value templateValue, tcfmt.template_re_user_id templateReUserId, tcfmt.is_common isCommon FROM t_cg_free_marker_template tcfmt
AND tcfmt.is_valid = 1
AND tcfmt.template_key LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{filter.templateKey} , '%' )
AND ( tcfmt.template_re_user_id = #{filter.currentUserId} OR tcfmt.is_common = 1 )
ORDER BY tcfmt.free_marker_template_id DESC
